info.title: Fieldkit API
info.description: A one-click open platform for field researchers and explorers.

get.description:
Retrieve summarized data

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

post.description: Creates a valid JWT given login credentials.

Creates a valid JWT given login credentials.

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

Add a project

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

get.description:

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

patch.description:
Update a project

  * `api:access`

post.description:
Invite a user to project

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

delete.description:
Remove a user from project

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

post.description:
Add a station to project

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

Required security scopes:

Get all field notes for a station

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

post.description:
Add a field note

  * `api:access`

delete.description:
Remove a field note

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

patch.description:
Update a field note

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

get.description:
List the station's projects

Required security scopes:
  * `api:access`

  * `api:access`

  * `api:access`

code.description: an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: Value of ID must be an integer

id.description: a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

meta.description: a meta object containing non-standard meta-information about the error.

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

example.detail: Value of ID must be an integer
